query.statement: UPDATE SAPHEE.ZCST131 SET CS131_TIS = '', AEDAT = HEX(CURRENT DATE), -- BS ETL 연계를 위한 식별컬럼 추가. 2020.11.19 Han J.H AEZEIT = HEX(CURRENT TIME) -- BS ETL 연계를 위한 식별컬럼 추가. 2020.11.19 Han J.H WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CS131_UPN = #UPN# AND CS131_CST = #CST# AND CS131_PJT = #PJT# AND CS131_HNO = #HNO# AND CS131_SEQ = #SEQ# AND CS131_GND = #GND# AND CS131_YYM || '01' >= #USD#
